community.title: Your Go-To Community for Affiliate Marketers
community.text1: AFFHUB unites affiliate marketing professionals, businesses, and media buyers through expert content, industry events, and a thriving media platform. We offer a space for skill growth, trend insights, and high-impact networking.
community.text2: With 50+ offline and 15 online events across Ukraine, Poland, Georgia, Kazakhstan, and Spain, AFFHUB is the organizer of the region‚Äôs largest digital marketing gatherings. Our events attract hundreds from across iGaming, Dating, Crypto, Nutra, E-commerce, Sweepstakes and others ‚Äì fostering unique cross-vertical collaboration.
community.text3: Each event blends knowledge sharing, networking, and vibrant experiences, helping members grow their networks, reach new markets, and build lasting industry connections.

features: Exclusive VIP Zone on the Afterparty

items.text: Connect directly with influential figures and decision-makers within the global affiliate marketing community
Receive VIP passes to private events and invite-only gatherings throughout the conference
Strengthen connections with top-tier clients, strategic partners, and key stakeholders in the affiliate ecosystem
Position your brand in front of a highly engaged, international audience of affiliates, partners, and media buyers
Benefit from bespoke sponsorship opportunities tailored to align with your goals and deliver measurable impact
Highlight your company as a forward-thinking innovator at the forefront of affiliate marketing

footer.description: Your go-to community for affiliate marketers and digital specialists. Your ultimate ecosystem for professional growth in the industry.
footer.footnote: PERLA HELSA EU SP. Z O.O., Poland 03-216, Warsaw, Modlinska str, 6A, office 222

PartnersTop.name: King_Partners
PartnersTop.text: King Partners ‚Äî the next-generation affiliate ecosystem üöÄ

sections.header: Making partnerships simple, transparent, and rewarding.
list: ‚ú® Intuitive tools to manage campaigns with ease
‚ú® 24/7 support that‚Äôs always there for you
‚ú® Flexible terms that grow with your goals
‚ú® Proven success in building lasting partnerships

PartnersTop.text2: As part of King Group, they unite technology, expertise, and people who care ‚Äî turning connections into results and partnerships into long-term growth.
PartnersTop.text3: King Partners are more than just an affiliate platform ‚Äî it`s a team that cares about your results and grows with your success.

partners.name: v-partners
partners.text:
V.Partners is the power source behind top affiliate performance.
With over 9 years of experience in the iGaming industry, V.Partners stands out as more than just an affiliate program ‚Äî it‚Äôs the energy driving profit.
partners.text2:
As a direct advertiser for high-performing casino and betting brands, the company offers exclusive deals, industry-leading conversion rates, and partnerships designed for sustainable growth.
Working across Tier 1 and Tier 2 GEOs, V.Partners provides flexible CPA, RevShare, and hybrid models to meet diverse partner goals.
partners.text3: Affiliates benefit from weekly payouts, dedicated support from experienced managers, and access to brands that are built to convert.
partners.text4: ‚ö°️ Power up your profit with V.Partners ‚Äî the affiliate program that‚Äôs always fully charged.

partners.name: frbs
partners.text:
FRBS is an iGaming media buying company focused on Tier-1 markets, with Facebook as its main traffic source.
The team brings together years of individual expertise and a well-established infrastructure. Thanks to a structured yet flexible approach, FRBS has built a strong foundation for profitable, long-term partnerships ‚Äî all in less than 6 months.
FRBS ‚Äî Fast ROI, Big Scale.

partners.name: trustee
partners.text:
Trustee Plus - cryptowallet with cryptocard. This is a mobile app which connecting cryptocurrency with fiat and makes using crypto easier in your casual life.

Personal IBAN

partners.name: everad
partners.text: Everad is a trusted force in affiliate marketing ‚Äî 12+ years on the market, 400+ in-house offers, 45+ GEOs, and payouts up to $50. We don‚Äôt guess what affiliates need ‚Äî we know, because we‚Äôve built the system for it. Flexible benefits, stable payouts, and real expertise ‚Äî that‚Äôs how we help partners grow.

partners.name: spt
partners.text: SPT is a leading team in the nutra vertical. We are a full-service team: we handle analytics, strategy, creative development, and traffic according to your request and geography. We perform most effectively because we have chosen and are developing deep expertise in a specific niche.

partners.name: omni
partners.text: Direct nutra advertiser since 2014. 40+ in-house offers with no reselling across EU, LATAM, and KZ.Own production, native-speaking call centers, and full logistics. Earn 20‚Äì30% more with dynamic payouts. Everyone upsells ‚Äî we‚Äôre in OMNI CPA, and we pay for it!

partners.name: playcash
partners.text1:
PlayCash is high-trusted iGaming affiliate network, established in 2020
The team provides CPA and RS offers, mostly oriented on conditions for FB apps, SEO, ASO, Google PPC and UAC traffic sources. Always ready to create profitable conditions for your traffic.
list: 900+ gambling and betting brands in 1 catalog
individual approach for offers recommendation
free apps for partners
bonus for volume and tests
rates boost for high-quality traffic
adaptive support bot Alertica
offer integration by your request
partners.text2: Just try and see your convert rate fly sky-high!

partners.name: scrooge
partners.text: ScroogeFrog provides trusted agency advertising accounts tailored to different verticals, with no setup fees, convenient payment options, guaranteed refunds, and dedicated support. We offer access to 130+ traffic sources across various GEOs‚Äîincluding native, social, search, in-app, and push. Minimum ad budgets start at just $300, and provider bonuses may be available.

partners.name: one_partners
partners.text: One Partners is an affiliate CPA program in gambling and betting, offering 800+ WW offers. The program has developed a truly high-quality product used by over 10k+ partners worldwide. It also features in-house creative development and PWA solutions.

partners.text: Direct nutra advertiser, operating in the market for over 9 years and offering end-to-end business solutions.

partners.name: hrcom
partners.text:
HR Community is an active online and offline network for HR professionals and recruiters in digital, affiliate, and IT. We were created to unite, support, and develop specialists who work daily with people, processes, and business growth.
This is a place where you can always get advice, support, trusted tools, and honest feedback.
Online and offline ‚Äî we don‚Äôt just connect people, we build an environment that moves the industry forward.
Our members constantly level up their expertise through mentorship, educational formats, and access to exclusive insights.
We were created by HRs, for HRs.

partners.name: affpro
partners.text: What is AFFPRO?
partners.text2: AFFPRO ‚Äî A Worldwide Affiliate Program Where You Always Win
partners.text3: The affiliate marketing industry, particularly in the gambling sector, is rapidly expanding, and AFFPRO stands as a great example of this progress.
partners.text4: AFFPRO is a global CPA network that provides favorable conditions for both webmasters and advertisers within the gambling and betting verticals. Over the years, AFFPRO has built a reputation for being a reliable and stable partner.
partners.text5: In this piece, we'll explore the unique aspects that make this network stand out from others and the benefits it offers.

partners.name: n1Partners
partners.text: N1 Partners is a multi-brand affiliate program operating since 2018, uniting 12+ licensed casino and sportsbook brands across 10+ Tier-1 GEOs. In the highly competitive iGaming market, we go beyond standard conditions, offering expertise, transparency, and consistent results. Partners benefit from high-converting offers, top-performing products, flexible, personalized deals, and transparent terms built on trusted relationships. With reliable payouts, multi-channel support, and an infrastructure designed for predictable earnings, we help partners thrive in even the most competitive markets.

partners.name: manymoney
partners.text: We're direct nutra advertiser with a huge experience and background in European market of Health&Beauty niche.
partners.text2: ManyMoney allows our partners to work directly with the advertiser. With us you will always get the best terms of the market. Our call centers are staffed only by native speakers who know the Health & Beauty audience like no one else.
partners.text3: We believe that everyone can achieve financial independence with the right tools and support. ManyMoney is designed to provide you with those tools and be a trusted partner on the path to your success. Join us today and start earning with ManyMoney!

partners.name: gentle_partners
partners.text: Gentle Partners is a CPA affiliate network created specifically for media buying teams in the iGaming niche. We combine deep traffic expertise with genuine care for every partner ‚Äî our support is always on your side. Gentle is more than just a network; it's a community that values performance, people, and style. We offer fair conditions, stable payouts, a deep understanding of market needs, and a personalized approach to every partner. Gentle Partners is regularly present at major industry events and creates its own meetups and YouTube formats to build media presence together with its partners. Everything we do ‚Äî we do with love for traffic.

partners.name: yosa
partners.text: YOSA is the ultimate show, insight source, and community for those in the know. We create content on the most relevant topics in digital marketing, with podcasts and live streams featuring industry leaders, top companies, and self-made online traffic experts. Our coverage includes the best professional conferences, top spots and the latest in affiliate marketing. With YOSA, you‚Äôre always at the center of the action.

partners.name: gamehub
partners.text: Gamehub - gambling affiliate program with 1000+ worldwide offers, fast and professional support, fast payouts and high CPA rates

partners.name: ezaff
partners.text: Ezaff is an affiliate marketing company focused on building new markets in Nutra vertical and delivering high-quality services for publishers. The main mission is to provide partners with efficient traffic processing solutions and ensure fast, reliable cash flow.

partners.name: tequila
partners.text: Tequila is more than just a partner network. It's a space where you have everything you need to scale: high-margin offers, fast payouts, clear communication, and streamlined processes - no bureaucracy. We work as equals - with transparency and confidence.
partners.text2: Tequila isn't just about numbers. It's about a team united by a shared goal: to grow. You run traffic - we've got the rest: support, product, quality control

partners.name: trident
partners.text: Trident Media -  Ukrainian media buying agency and mobile app development service, headquartered in Kyiv. Since 2020, we‚Äôve grown up to 190 teammates.
partners.text2: We aim to become one of the top performance marketing agencies in Eastern Europe
partners.text3: Our values: analytics, transparency, and quality traffic.
partners.text4: Our culture is freedom, low bureaucracy and rapid growth.

partners.name: flint
partners.text: Flint Group ‚Äî a company specializing in SEO for high-risk niches. We provide full SEO support and ensure Brand Safe promotion, helping brands grow confidently and sustainably even in the most competitive verticals.

partners.name: win-offers
partners.text: Win-Offers is an affiliate program with exclusive iGaming offers for Europe such as BetMatch (HU & DACH) and RoyalSea (IT & HU & DACH), and several offers for Ukraine (among them Parik24) as well as for Ukrainians in Europe (Stawki.bet).
partners.text2: Win-Offers supports CPA, RevShare, and Hybrid models.

list: ‚≠êÔ∏è exclusive high-converting offers;
‚≠êÔ∏è timely bi-weekly payouts from $100 via all popular methods (including crypto);
‚≠êÔ∏è custom creatives on demand;
‚≠êÔ∏è dedicated AM support with regular promotions.

partners.text4: Win-Offers focuses on building long-term, win-win partnerships and additionally provides a lifetime referral program ‚Äî 3% of each referred partner‚Äôs profit.

partners.name: onetraf
partners.text: OneTraff is the leading PWA solution on the market. With the most precise and detailed statistics, allowing you to see exactly what happens to your traffic, where you‚Äôre losing users, and how to optimize performance.

partners.name: r2d
partners.text: Is a multi-brand affiliate program designed for traffic monetization in the gambling and betting industry. Within our affiliate network, you'll find exclusive direct offers from leading brands  ‚Äì LEON, Twin and Slott. R2D aims to combine fresh ideas and extensive experience, providing affiliates with a reliable and profitable partnership.

partners.text: –°–°-submit & SOI network with more than 6 years experience on the market. We have large number of direct advertisers and highly competitive EPC.

partners.text2: Development of a private PWA label for teams, partners, and products.
partners.text4: Rental and custom development of iOS and Android applications for all verticals ‚Äî quick start and maximum profit!

partners.name: bobaffs
partners.text: BOBAFFS - growth ecosystem in igaming.
partners.text2: A cpa network equipped with tools for webmasters and affiliate teams, created to bring organic relationship, transparency, and simplicity to the industry‚Äôs growth process.
partners.text3: For webmasters, we provide reliable and profitable cooperation, while advertisers gain access to high volumes and top-quality traffic. our flexibility, attention to detail, and focus on mutually beneficial long-term partnerships make bobaffs the right place for growth and sustainable earnings.

partners.name: pmaffiliates
partners.text: Parimatch Affiliates ‚Äî is the official affiliate program of the international iGaming operator Parimatch. As a partner, you‚Äôll gain access to exclusive conditions for monetizing traffic in the Gambling, Betting, and Esports verticals, working directly with a globally trusted brand operating for over 30 years.
partners.text2: Parimatch is represented by high-profile sports ambassadors, is the regional sponsor of the Argentinian Football Association and UFC ‚Äì The Ultimate Fighting Championship, and is actively involved in major sponsorships, including Leicester City FC and Nottingham Forest FC in the 2024/25 Premier League season.
partners.text3: On top of that, Parimatch is Leeds United‚Äôs Official Sleeve Partner and Manchester United‚Äôs Official Betting Partner across Asia and the MENA region.

partners.name: traffhub
partners.text: TraffHub is a Ukrainian media buying team in the iGaming industry that has been successfully operating on the market for over 4 years.
partners.text2: Our main value is people. Our key advantage is our ecosystem.
partners.text3: A comprehensive infrastructure, automated processes, transparency in the system, a constant network, and corporate culture are exactly what drives our colleagues and guides them to results.

list: ‚óá The best partners
‚óá The most profitable offers
‚óá The most modern tools and approaches

partners.text3: Global reach: 100+ countries, including Tier 1, Tier 2, and LATAM

Huffson Group - your reliable partner in the iGaming world.

partners.name: alreadymedia
partners.text: Already Media is a tech-driven SEO & affiliate company whose brand has grown into one of the industry leaders in just three years. The company entered the ranks of the strongest iGaming players, taking 17th place in the prestigious EGR Power Affiliate 2024 ranking. We demonstrate steady growth: last year alone, traffic increased by 44%, reaching 130,000 FTDs monthly. Our team now spans 21 countries, with 23% of employees being SEO specialists. In 2024‚Äì2025, we executed three public deals and strengthened our presence in key markets ‚Äî Latam, Asia, and Africa.

partners.name: mmt
partners.text: Marvel Money Traff is an affiliate and media buying team operating since 2020. We work across Tier 1 to Tier 3 GEOs with a performance-driven and creative approach. Our steadily growing team is built on transparency, ownership, and deep expertise in affiliate marketing.
partners.text2: We‚Äôre always on the lookout for talented solo media buyers ‚Äî and open to partnering with ready-made teams.
partners.text3: We offer up to 50% profit share, perfect infrastructure, unlimited ad budgets, and a long-term mindset.

list: BANKNOT is a modern cryptocurrency exchange service that operates legally and transparently.
We have physical offices across Poland and a convenient 24/7 online exchange, making buying and selling crypto as simple and secure as possible.

partners.textLast: BANKNOT ‚Äî crypto exchange without hassle or hidden fees. Convenient. Reliable. Transparent.
